recipes.title: Hyderabadi Chicken Biryani
recipes.description: A flavorful and aromatic biryani from Hyderabad, featuring marinated chicken and fragrant basmati rice cooked on dum.
procedure: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt, biryani masala, ginger-garlic paste, and salt for 2 hours.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Parboil basmati rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
4. Layer the marinated chicken and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
5. Add saffron-infused milk, coriander leaves, and mint leaves between layers.
6. Seal the pot with dough and cook on dum (low heat) for 40 minutes.
7. Gently mix before serving.

recipes.title: Paneer Biryani
recipes.description: A rich and aromatic vegetarian biryani with paneer cubes and fragrant spices, cooked to perfection.
procedure: 1. Marinate paneer with yogurt, biryani masala, ginger-garlic paste, and salt for 30 minutes.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Parboil basmati rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
4. Layer the marinated paneer and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
5. Add saffron-infused milk, coriander leaves, and mint leaves between layers.
6. Seal the pot with dough and cook on dum (low heat) for 30 minutes.
7. Gently mix before serving.

recipes.title: Mutton Biryani
recipes.description: A traditional biryani made with tender mutton, aromatic spices, and long-grain basmati rice.
procedure: 1. Marinate mutton with yogurt, biryani masala, ginger-garlic paste, and salt for 4 hours.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Parboil basmati rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
4. Layer the marinated mutton and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
5. Add saffron-infused milk, coriander leaves, and mint leaves between layers.
6. Seal the pot with dough and cook on dum (low heat) for 50 minutes.
7. Gently mix before serving.

recipes.title: Mushroom Biryani
recipes.description: A delicious vegetarian biryani made with mushrooms, fragrant basmati rice, and aromatic spices.
procedure: 1. Marinate mushrooms with yogurt, biryani masala, ginger-garlic paste, and salt for 30 minutes.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Parboil basmati rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
4. Layer the marinated mushrooms and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
5. Add saffron-infused milk, coriander leaves, and mint leaves between layers.
6. Seal the pot with dough and cook on dum (low heat) for 30 minutes.
7. Gently mix before serving.

recipes.title: Subzi Biryani
recipes.description: A delightful mix vegetable biryani cooked with basmati rice, aromatic spices, and herbs for a flavorful experience.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (carrots, beans, peas, potatoes)
procedure: 1. Chop vegetables into bite-sized pieces and parboil them.
2. Marinate the vegetables with yogurt, biryani masala, ginger-garlic paste, and salt for 30 minutes.
3. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
4. Parboil basmati rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
5. Layer the marinated vegetables and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
6. Add saffron-infused milk, coriander leaves, and mint leaves between layers.
7. Seal the pot with dough and cook on dum (low heat) for 30 minutes.
8. Gently mix before serving.

recipes.title: Cauliflower Biryani
recipes.description: A flavorful and nutritious biryani made with spiced cauliflower florets and fragrant basmati rice.
procedure: 1. Marinate cauliflower florets with yogurt, biryani masala, ginger-garlic paste, and salt for 30 minutes.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Parboil basmati rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
4. Layer the marinated cauliflower and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
5. Add saffron-infused milk, coriander leaves, and mint leaves between layers.
6. Seal the pot with dough and cook on dum (low heat) for 30 minutes.
7. Gently mix before serving.

recipes.title: Aloo Gobi Biryani
recipes.description: A delicious North Indian biryani with potatoes and cauliflower, cooked with aromatic spices.
procedure: 1. Marinate potatoes and cauliflower with yogurt, biryani masala, ginger-garlic paste, and salt for 30 minutes.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Parboil basmati rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
4. Layer the marinated vegetables and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
5. Add saffron-infused milk, coriander leaves, and mint leaves between layers.
6. Seal the pot with dough and cook on dum (low heat) for 30 minutes.
7. Gently mix before serving.

recipes.title: Tofu Biryani
recipes.description: A protein-packed vegetarian biryani with tofu and fragrant spices, perfect for a healthy meal.
procedure: 1. Marinate tofu cubes with yogurt, biryani masala, ginger-garlic paste, and salt for 30 minutes.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Parboil basmati rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
4. Layer the marinated tofu and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
5. Add saffron-infused milk, coriander leaves, and mint leaves between layers.
6. Seal the pot with dough and cook on dum (low heat) for 30 minutes.
7. Gently mix before serving.

recipes.title: Vegetable Pulao
recipes.description: A light and nutritious one-pot rice dish with assorted vegetables and mild spices.
procedure: 1. Sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste in ghee until golden brown.
2. Add chopped vegetables and cook until slightly tender.
3. Add pulao masala and mix well.
4. Parboil basmati rice and add to the vegetable mix.
5. Add saffron-infused milk, coriander leaves, and mint leaves.
6. Cover and cook on low heat for 20 minutes.
7. Gently fluff before serving.

recipes.title: Mixed Vegetable Biryani
recipes.description: A colorful and nutritious biryani made with assorted vegetables, basmati rice, and aromatic spices.
procedure: 1. Marinate the vegetables with yogurt, biryani masala, ginger-garlic paste, and salt for 30 minutes.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Parboil basmati rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
4. Layer the marinated vegetables and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
5. Add saffron-infused milk, coriander leaves, and mint leaves between layers.
6. Seal the pot with dough and cook on dum (low heat) for 30 minutes.
7. Gently mix before serving.

recipes.title: Bottle Gourd Biryani
recipes.description: A unique and healthy biryani made with bottle gourd (lauki), flavored with spices and herbs.
procedure: 1. Marinate bottle gourd with yogurt, biryani masala, ginger-garlic paste, and salt for 30 minutes.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Parboil basmati rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
4. Layer the marinated bottle gourd and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
5. Add saffron-infused milk, coriander leaves, and mint leaves between layers.
6. Seal the pot with dough and cook on dum (low heat) for 30 minutes.
7. Gently mix before serving.

recipes.title: Green Pea Biryani
recipes.description: A simple and flavorful biryani with green peas, aromatic basmati rice, and Indian spices.
procedure: 1. Marinate green peas with yogurt, biryani masala, ginger-garlic paste, and salt for 30 minutes.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Parboil basmati rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
4. Layer the marinated green peas and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
5. Add saffron-infused milk, coriander leaves, and mint leaves between layers.
6. Seal the pot with dough and cook on dum (low heat) for 30 minutes.
7. Gently mix before serving.

recipes.title: Chicken Biryani
recipes.description: A classic and popular biryani made with marinated chicken, fragrant rice, and a blend of aromatic spices.
procedure: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt, biryani masala, ginger-garlic paste, and salt for 2 hours.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Parboil basmati rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
4. Layer the marinated chicken and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
5. Add saffron-infused milk, coriander leaves, and mint leaves between layers.
6. Seal the pot with dough and cook on dum (low heat) for 40 minutes.
7. Gently mix before serving.

recipes.title: Lucknowi Biryani
recipes.description: A royal Awadhi-style biryani known for its subtle flavors and slow-cooked aromatic spices.
procedure: 1. Marinate mutton with yogurt, garam masala, ginger-garlic paste, salt, and rose water for 4 hours.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Parboil basmati rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
4. Layer the marinated mutton and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
5. Add saffron-infused milk, kewra water, coriander leaves, and mint leaves between layers.
6. Seal the pot with dough and cook on dum (low heat) for 45 minutes.
7. Gently mix before serving.

recipes.title: Thalassery Biryani
recipes.description: A unique Malabar biryani from Kerala, known for its use of fragrant short-grain rice and mild spices.
procedure: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt, fennel powder, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, and salt for 2 hours.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
4. Parboil Jeerakasala rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
5. Layer the chicken mixture and rice in a pot.
6. Add lemon juice, coriander leaves, and mint leaves between layers.
7. Seal and cook on dum (low heat) for 30 minutes.
8. Mix gently before serving.

recipes.title: Ambur Biryani
recipes.description: A famous Tamil Nadu biryani, prepared with seeraga samba rice and a simple yet flavorful masala.
procedure: 1. Marinate mutton with yogurt, chili powder, coriander powder, and salt for 3 hours.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
4. Add marinated mutton and cook until tender.
5. Parboil Seeraga Samba rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
6. Layer mutton mixture and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
7. Add coconut milk, coriander leaves, and mint leaves.
8. Seal and cook on dum (low heat) for 40 minutes.
9. Mix gently before serving.

recipes.title: Sindhi Biryani
recipes.description: A spicy and tangy biryani from Sindh, Pakistan, known for its use of tomatoes, potatoes, and dried plums.
procedure: 1. Marinate chicken with ginger-garlic paste, green chili paste, and salt for 1 hour.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
4. Add potatoes and cook for a few minutes.
5. Parboil basmati rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
6. Layer chicken mixture, rice, and dried plums in a heavy-bottomed pot.
7. Add lemon juice, coriander leaves, and mint leaves between layers.
8. Seal and cook on dum (low heat) for 35 minutes.
9. Mix gently before serving.

recipes.title: Kolkata Biryani
recipes.description: A mildly spiced and aromatic biryani from Kolkata, known for its use of potatoes and subtle flavors.
procedure: 1. Marinate chicken/mutton with yogurt, biryani masala, ginger-garlic paste, and salt for 4 hours.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Fry potatoes until slightly golden and set aside.
4. Parboil basmati rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
5. Layer the marinated meat, potatoes, and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
6. Add saffron-infused milk, coriander leaves, mint leaves, rose water, and kewra water between layers.
7. Seal the pot with dough and cook on dum (low heat) for 45 minutes.
8. Gently mix before serving.

recipes.title: Dindigul Biryani
recipes.description: A South Indian biryani from Dindigul, known for its tangy and spicy flavors using seeraga samba rice.
procedure: 1. Marinate mutton/chicken with yogurt, black pepper, biryani masala, and salt for 2 hours.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
4. Add marinated meat and cook until tender.
5. Parboil seeraga samba rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
6. Layer the cooked meat and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
7. Add coriander leaves, mint leaves, and lemon juice between layers.
8. Seal the pot and cook on dum (low heat) for 40 minutes.
9. Gently mix before serving.

recipes.title: Chettinad Biryani
recipes.description: A spicy and flavorful biryani from Chettinad, made with bold spices and seeraga samba rice.
procedure: 1. Marinate chicken/mutton with yogurt, Chettinad spice mix, and salt for 3 hours.
2. Fry sliced onions in ghee until golden brown.
3. Add chopped tomatoes and dried red chilies, cook until soft.
4. Add marinated meat and cook until tender.
5. Parboil seeraga samba rice with whole spices until 70% cooked.
6. Layer the cooked meat and rice in a heavy-bottomed pot.
7. Add coconut milk, coriander leaves, and mint leaves between layers.
8. Seal the pot and cook on dum (low heat) for 45 minutes.
9. Gently mix before serving.

recipes.title: Black Bean Burger
recipes.description: A hearty and flavorful vegetarian burger made with black beans, spices, and breadcrumbs.
ingredients: 1 egg (or flax egg for vegan version)
procedure: 1. Mash the black beans in a large bowl until mostly smooth.
2. Add breadcrumbs, onions, bell peppers, garlic, cumin, chili powder, soy sauce, and egg.
3. Mix well and form into four equal-sized patties.
4. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
5. Cook the patties for 4-5 minutes on each side until golden brown and crispy.
6. Serve on a toasted bun with lettuce, tomato, and your favorite condiments.

recipes.title: Mushroom Swiss Burger
recipes.description: A delicious burger featuring sautéed mushrooms and melted Swiss cheese on a juicy patty.
procedure: 1. Melt butter in a pan over medium heat.
2. Add mushrooms and garlic, sauté until golden and tender.
3. Cook the burger patties in a separate pan or grill for 4-5 minutes per side.
4. Place a slice of Swiss cheese on each patty and let it melt.
5. Toast the burger buns lightly.
6. Assemble the burger with lettuce, tomato, mushroom topping, and patty.
7. Serve hot with fries or a side salad.

recipes.title: Lentil Burger
recipes.description: A protein-packed vegetarian burger made with lentils, spices, and whole grains.
ingredients: 1 egg (or flax egg for vegan version)
procedure: 1. Mash the cooked lentils in a bowl.
2. Add rolled oats, breadcrumbs, onions, garlic, paprika, cumin, soy sauce, and egg.
3. Mix well and form into four patties.
4. Heat olive oil in a pan and cook the patties for 4-5 minutes per side.
5. Serve on a toasted bun with lettuce, tomato, and your favorite condiments.

recipes.title: Quinoa Veggie Burger
recipes.description: A nutritious and delicious burger made with quinoa, vegetables, and flavorful seasonings.
ingredients: 1 egg (or flax egg for vegan version)
procedure: 1. In a bowl, mix quinoa, grated carrots, bell peppers, breadcrumbs, and seasonings.
2. Add the egg and mix until everything binds together.
3. Shape the mixture into four patties.
4. Heat olive oil in a pan and cook each patty for 4-5 minutes per side.
5. Serve on a bun with lettuce, tomato, and your favorite condiments.

recipes.title: Sweet Potato Falafel Burger
recipes.description: A Middle Eastern-inspired burger made with mashed sweet potatoes and spiced chickpeas.
procedure: 1. Mash the sweet potatoes and chickpeas together in a bowl.
2. Add flour, parsley, garlic, cumin, coriander, salt, and pepper.
3. Mix well and form into four patties.
4. Heat olive oil in a pan and cook each patty for 4-5 minutes per side.
5. Serve in a pita or bun with tahini sauce and salad.

recipes.title: Chicken Aloo Tikki Burger
recipes.description: A fusion burger combining crispy chicken and spiced aloo tikki, served with fresh veggies and tangy sauce.
procedure: 1. Mix minced chicken, mashed potato, breadcrumbs, garam masala, cumin powder, red chili powder, and salt in a bowl.
2. Shape the mixture into patties and coat them with cornflour.
3. Dip the patties in beaten egg and then coat them with breadcrumbs.
4. Heat oil in a pan and shallow fry the patties until golden brown.
5. Toast the burger buns lightly.
6. Spread mayonnaise and mint chutney on the buns.
7. Place lettuce, the fried patty, tomato, and onion slices in the burger.
8. Cover with the top bun and serve hot.

recipes.title: Chicken Barbecue Burger
recipes.description: A smoky and juicy barbecue-flavored chicken burger with melted cheese and fresh toppings.
procedure: 1. Marinate chicken breast with barbecue sauce, smoked paprika, garlic powder, salt, and olive oil for 30 minutes.
2. Grill the marinated chicken on medium heat until cooked through.
3. Toast the burger buns lightly.
4. Spread mayonnaise and mustard sauce on the buns.
5. Place lettuce, grilled chicken, cheddar cheese, caramelized onions, and tomato slices in the burger.
6. Cover with the top bun and serve warm.

recipes.title: Chicken Indian Traditional Burger
recipes.description: A burger infused with Indian spices, featuring a spiced chicken patty, mint chutney, and crispy onions.
procedure: 1. Mix minced chicken with yogurt, breadcrumbs, garam masala, turmeric powder, cumin powder, red chili powder, salt, and chopped coriander leaves.
2. Shape the mixture into patties and coat with cornflour.
3. Dip in beaten egg and coat with breadcrumbs.
4. Heat oil in a pan and fry the patties until golden brown.
5. Toast the burger buns lightly.
6. Spread mint chutney and mayonnaise on the buns.
7. Place lettuce, fried chicken patty, crispy onions, and tomato slices.
8. Cover with the top bun and serve hot.

recipes.title: Chicken Mexican Burger
recipes.description: A spicy Mexican-inspired burger with grilled chicken, jalapenos, and zesty chipotle sauce.
procedure: 1. Marinate chicken breast with cumin powder, smoked paprika, garlic powder, salt, and olive oil for 30 minutes.
2. Grill the marinated chicken until fully cooked.
3. Toast the burger buns lightly.
4. Spread chipotle mayo on both sides of the buns.
5. Place lettuce, grilled chicken, pepper jack cheese, jalapenos, and tomato slices.
6. Cover with the top bun and serve hot.

recipes.title: Egg Tikki Burger
recipes.description: A unique burger featuring a crispy spiced egg patty, fresh veggies, and a flavorful sauce.
procedure: 1. Boil the eggs, peel them, and mash with boiled potato, breadcrumbs, cumin powder, red chili powder, salt, and chopped coriander.
2. Shape into patties and coat with cornflour.
3. Heat oil in a pan and shallow fry the patties until golden brown.
4. Toast the burger buns lightly.
5. Spread mayonnaise and mustard sauce on the buns.
6. Place lettuce, egg patty, tomato, and onion slices.
7. Cover with the top bun and serve warm.

recipes.title: Carrot Cake
recipes.description: A moist and flavorful cake made with grated carrots, warm spices, and topped with creamy frosting.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a cake pan.
2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
3. In another bowl, beat eggs, sugar, brown sugar, oil, and vanilla extract until smooth.
4. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture and mix well.
5. Fold in grated carrots and chopped walnuts.
6. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.
7. Let the cake cool before frosting with cream cheese frosting.

recipes.title: Red Velvet Cake
recipes.description: A soft and rich red velvet cake with a slight cocoa flavor, layered with creamy frosting.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a cake pan.
2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt.
3. In another bowl, beat butter and sugar until fluffy.
4. Add eggs one at a time, then mix in vanilla extract and red food coloring.
5. Alternately add the dry ingredients and buttermilk, mixing until smooth.
6. Stir in vinegar and mix well.
7. Pour the batter into the cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.
8. Let cool before frosting with cream cheese frosting.

recipes.title: Black Forest Cake
recipes.description: A classic German chocolate cake layered with cherries, whipped cream, and chocolate shavings.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease two cake pans.
2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and sugar.
3. Add eggs, buttermilk, oil, and vanilla extract, mixing well.
4. Slowly add hot water while stirring until the batter is smooth.
5. Pour the batter evenly into the cake pans and bake for 30-35 minutes.
6. Let the cakes cool completely before assembling.
7. Layer the cake with whipped cream and cherries.
8. Sprinkle chocolate shavings on top before serving.

recipes.title: Eggless Chocolate Cake
recipes.description: A rich and moist eggless chocolate cake made with cocoa powder and layered with creamy chocolate frosting.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease two cake pans.
2. In a bowl, mix flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and sugar.
3. Add milk, oil, and vanilla extract, mixing well.
4. Slowly add boiling water while stirring until the batter is smooth.
5. Pour the batter into the cake pans and bake for 30-35 minutes.
6. Let the cakes cool before assembling.
7. Layer with chocolate frosting and serve.

recipes.title: Cheesecake
recipes.description: A creamy and rich baked cheesecake with a buttery graham cracker crust.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C) and grease a springform pan.
2. Mix graham cracker crumbs, melted butter, and sugar. Press into the bottom of the pan.
3. In a bowl, beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth.
4. Add eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. Stir in vanilla extract and sour cream until smooth.
6. Pour the filling over the crust and bake for 45-50 minutes.
7. Let the cheesecake cool, then refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.

recipes.title: Coconut Cake
recipes.description: A light and fluffy coconut cake layered with coconut frosting and topped with shredded coconut.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease two cake pans.
2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt.
3. In another bowl, beat butter and sugar until fluffy.
4. Add eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. Mix in vanilla extract and coconut milk.
6. Gradually add dry ingredients and mix until smooth.
7. Fold in shredded coconut.
8. Pour the batter into the cake pans and bake for 30-35 minutes.
9. Let cool before frosting with coconut frosting and topping with more shredded coconut.

recipes.title: Coffee Cake
recipes.description: A soft and moist cinnamon-flavored coffee cake topped with a buttery streusel crumble.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a cake pan.
2. In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon.
3. In another bowl, cream butter and sugar until fluffy.
4. Add vanilla extract and mix well.
5. Gradually add dry ingredients and milk, mixing until smooth.
6. Pour the batter into the cake pan and top with a cinnamon streusel crumble.
7. Bake for 30-35 minutes until golden brown.
8. Let cool before serving.

recipes.title: Lemon Cake
recipes.description: A bright and zesty lemon cake with a soft texture, topped with a tangy lemon glaze.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a cake pan.
2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt.
3. In another bowl, beat butter, sugar, and oil until fluffy.
4. Add eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. Stir in lemon juice, lemon zest, and vanilla extract.
6. Gradually add dry ingredients and mix until smooth.
7. Pour the batter into the cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.
8. Let cool before drizzling with lemon glaze.

recipes.title: Devil's Food Cake
recipes.description: A rich and decadent chocolate cake with a deep, dark color and a moist, airy texture.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease two cake pans.
2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
3. Add eggs, buttermilk, oil, and vanilla extract, mixing well.
4. Slowly add hot water while stirring until the batter is smooth.
5. Pour the batter into the cake pans and bake for 30-35 minutes.
6. Let the cakes cool completely before assembling.
7. Frost with chocolate ganache or buttercream before serving.

recipes.title: Pound Cake
recipes.description: A classic buttery cake with a dense, rich texture, perfect with tea or coffee.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a loaf pan.
2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt.
3. In another bowl, beat butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
4. Add eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. Mix in vanilla extract.
6. Alternately add the dry ingredients and milk, mixing until smooth.
7. Pour the batter into the loaf pan and bake for 50-60 minutes.
8. Let cool before slicing and serving.

recipes.title: Angel Food Cake
recipes.description: A light and fluffy cake made with egg whites, perfect for pairing with fresh berries and whipped cream.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and prepare a tube pan (do not grease).
2. In a bowl, sift together cake flour and half the sugar.
3. In a separate bowl, beat egg whites until foamy, then add cream of tartar and salt.
4. Gradually add the remaining sugar while continuing to beat until stiff peaks form.
5. Gently fold in the flour mixture and vanilla extract.
6. Pour the batter into the tube pan and smooth the top.
7. Bake for 35-40 minutes until golden brown and springy to the touch.
8. Invert the pan and let the cake cool completely before removing.

recipes.title: Chiffon Cake
recipes.description: A soft and airy cake that combines the richness of butter cakes and the lightness of sponge cakes.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (160°C) and grease a tube pan.
2. In a bowl, whisk together cake flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. Add oil, egg yolks, water, and vanilla extract, then mix until smooth.
4. In another bowl, beat egg whites and cream of tartar until stiff peaks form.
5. Gently fold the egg whites into the batter until fully incorporated.
6. Pour the batter into the pan and smooth the top.
7. Bake for 50-55 minutes until golden brown and springy.
8. Let cool before slicing and serving.

recipes.title: Hummingbird Cake
recipes.description: A moist and tropical-flavored cake made with bananas, pineapple, and warm spices, topped with cream cheese frosting.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease two cake pans.
2. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt.
3. In another bowl, beat eggs, oil, and vanilla extract until combined.
4. Stir in mashed bananas, crushed pineapple, and pecans.
5. Gradually mix the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients.
6. Pour batter into cake pans and bake for 25-30 minutes.
7. Let cool before frosting with cream cheese frosting.

recipes.title: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake
recipes.description: A classic buttery cake with caramelized pineapple and cherries baked on top.
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a cake pan.
2. Melt butter and pour it into the pan, then sprinkle brown sugar evenly.
3. Arrange pineapple slices and place cherries in the center of each slice.
4. In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt.
5. In another bowl, beat sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract until fluffy.
6. Alternately add dry ingredients and milk, mixing until smooth.
7. Pour batter over the pineapple slices and bake for 35-40 minutes.
8. Let cool slightly, then invert the cake onto a plate before serving.

recipes.title: Apple Cake
recipes.description: A spiced apple cake filled with chunks of fresh apples, perfect for fall desserts.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a cake pan.
2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
3. In another bowl, beat sugar, brown sugar, oil, applesauce, and vanilla extract.
4. Gradually mix the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients until combined.
5. Fold in chopped apples and walnuts.
6. Pour batter into the prepared pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.
7. Let cool before serving. Can be topped with powdered sugar or caramel glaze.

recipes.title: German Chocolate Cake
recipes.description: A rich and indulgent chocolate cake layered with coconut-pecan frosting, a true classic.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease two cake pans.
2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and sugar.
3. Add eggs, buttermilk, oil, and vanilla extract, mixing well.
4. Slowly add hot water while stirring until the batter is smooth.
5. Pour the batter evenly into the cake pans and bake for 30-35 minutes.
6. Let cakes cool before preparing the frosting.
7. In a saucepan, heat evaporated milk, butter, and brown sugar until melted.
8. Stir in shredded coconut and chopped pecans, cooking until thickened.
9. Spread the frosting between layers and over the cake before serving.

recipes.title: Eggless Vanilla Cake
recipes.description: A soft and fluffy vanilla cake made without eggs, perfect for any occasion.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a cake pan.
2. In a bowl, mix flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
3. In another bowl, whisk sugar, oil, milk, vinegar, and vanilla extract.
4. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture and mix until smooth.
5. Pour the batter into the cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.
6. Let cool before serving or frosting.

recipes.title: Eggless Banana Cake
recipes.description: A moist and delicious banana cake made without eggs, perfect for breakfast or dessert.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a cake pan.
2. In a bowl, mix flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon.
3. In another bowl, whisk sugar, oil, mashed bananas, vanilla extract, and yogurt.
4. Gradually add dry ingredients to the wet mixture and stir until combined.
5. Pour the batter into the cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.
6. Let cool before serving.

recipes.title: Eggless Caramel Cake
recipes.description: A rich and moist caramel-flavored cake without eggs, topped with smooth caramel glaze.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a cake pan.
2. In a bowl, mix flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
3. In another bowl, whisk sugar, oil, milk, caramel sauce, and vanilla extract.
4. Gradually add dry ingredients to the wet mixture and stir until smooth.
5. Pour the batter into the cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.
6. Let cool and drizzle with caramel sauce before serving.

recipes.title: Eggless Fruit Cake
recipes.description: A delicious, moist fruit cake packed with dried fruits and nuts, made without eggs.
ingredients: 1 cup mixed dried fruits (raisins, apricots, cherries)
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (160°C) and grease a cake pan.
2. In a bowl, mix flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
3. In another bowl, whisk sugar, oil, milk, and vanilla extract.
4. Gradually add dry ingredients to the wet mixture and mix well.
5. Fold in dried fruits and chopped nuts.
6. Pour the batter into the cake pan and bake for 40-45 minutes.
7. Let cool before slicing and serving.

recipes.title: Vanilla Cake
recipes.description: A classic soft and fluffy vanilla-flavored cake, perfect for any occasion.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a cake pan.
2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt.
3. In another bowl, beat butter and sugar until fluffy.
4. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
5. Mix in vanilla extract.
6. Alternately add the dry ingredients and milk, mixing until smooth.
7. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.
8. Let cool before serving or frosting.

recipes.title: Banana Cake
recipes.description: A moist and sweet banana-flavored cake with a rich texture and natural sweetness.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a cake pan.
2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
3. In another bowl, beat butter and sugar until creamy.
4. Add eggs one at a time, then mix in mashed bananas and vanilla extract.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients while alternating with milk.
6. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.
7. Let cool before serving.

recipes.title: Caramel Cake
recipes.description: A decadent caramel-flavored cake with a rich caramel glaze for extra indulgence.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a cake pan.
2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt.
3. In another bowl, beat butter, sugar, and brown sugar until creamy.
4. Add eggs one at a time, then mix in vanilla extract.
5. Alternately add the dry ingredients and milk, mixing until smooth.
6. Fold in caramel sauce and mix well.
7. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.
8. Let cool before drizzling with extra caramel sauce.

recipes.title: Molten Chocolate Cake
recipes.description: A rich and gooey molten chocolate cake with a soft, oozing center, perfect for chocolate lovers.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C) and grease ramekins.
2. Melt dark chocolate and butter together over low heat, stirring until smooth.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk eggs, egg yolks, sugar, and vanilla extract until thick and pale.
4. Gently fold the melted chocolate mixture into the egg mixture.
5. Sift in flour and salt, and mix until just combined.
6. Pour the batter into the greased ramekins, filling them about 3/4 full.
7. Bake for 10-12 minutes until the edges are set but the center remains gooey.
8. Let cool for a minute before serving warm.

recipes.title: Strawberry Cake
recipes.description: A soft and moist strawberry cake made with fresh strawberries, topped with delicious frosting.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a cake pan.
2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
3. In another bowl, cream butter and sugar until fluffy.
4. Add eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. Stir in vanilla extract and fresh strawberry puree.
6. Alternately add dry ingredients and milk, mixing until smooth.
7. Add pink food coloring if desired for a richer color.
8. Pour the batter into the cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.
9. Let the cake cool before frosting with strawberry cream cheese frosting.

recipes.title: Masala Chaat
recipes.description: A tangy and spicy chaat made with boiled potatoes, chickpeas, and chaat masala.
procedure: 1. In a bowl, mix boiled potatoes, chickpeas, onion, tomato, and green chili.
2. Add chaat masala, cumin powder, black salt, red chili powder, and lemon juice.
3. Mix well and drizzle tamarind chutney over it.
4. Garnish with chopped coriander and sev before serving.

recipes.title: Gobi Chaat
recipes.description: A crispy and flavorful cauliflower chaat with spices and chutneys.
ingredients: Chopped onions and coriander for garnish
procedure: 1. Mix gram flour, rice flour, turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, and salt in a bowl.
2. Add water gradually to form a thick batter.
3. Dip cauliflower florets into the batter and deep-fry until golden brown.
4. Toss the fried florets with chaat masala and serve with tamarind and green chutney.
5. Garnish with chopped onions and coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Aloo Tikki Chaat
recipes.description: Crispy potato patties served with yogurt, chutneys, and spices.
ingredients: Sev and chopped coriander for garnish
procedure: 1. Mash boiled potatoes and mix with bread crumbs, salt, cumin powder, chaat masala, and black pepper.
2. Shape into small patties and shallow-fry until golden brown.
3. Place the tikkis on a plate and top with yogurt, tamarind chutney, and green chutney.
4. Garnish with sev and coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Papdi Chaat
recipes.description: Crispy papdis topped with yogurt, chutneys, and flavorful spices.
ingredients: Sev and chopped coriander for garnish
procedure: 1. Arrange papdis on a serving plate.
2. Top with boiled chickpeas and potatoes.
3. Drizzle yogurt, tamarind chutney, and green chutney over the papdis.
4. Sprinkle chaat masala and black salt.
5. Garnish with sev and coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Dahi Papad Chaat
recipes.description: A crispy and tangy chaat made with roasted papad, spiced yogurt, chutneys, and crunchy toppings.
procedure: 1. Roast the papads on an open flame or dry roast in a pan until crispy.
2. Break the papads into large pieces and place them on a serving plate.
3. Spread the mashed potato and chickpea mixture evenly over the papads.
4. Drizzle whisked yogurt, tamarind chutney, and green chutney on top.
5. Sprinkle chopped onions, tomatoes, chaat masala, cumin powder, and black salt.
6. Garnish with sev and chopped coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Samosa Chaat
recipes.description: Crispy samosas crushed and topped with spiced chickpeas, yogurt, and chutneys.
ingredients: Sev and chopped coriander for garnish
procedure: 1. Crush the samosas on a plate.
2. Top with boiled chickpeas and yogurt.
3. Drizzle tamarind chutney and green chutney.
4. Sprinkle chaat masala, black salt, and red chili powder.
5. Garnish with sev and coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Sev Puri
recipes.description: Crispy puris topped with a mix of potatoes, chutneys, and lots of sev.
procedure: 1. Arrange puris on a plate.
2. Add boiled potatoes, chopped onions, and tomatoes on top.
3. Drizzle tamarind chutney and green chutney.
4. Sprinkle chaat masala, black salt, and red chili powder.
5. Generously top with sev and garnish with coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Ragda Pattice
recipes.description: A delicious chaat with crispy potato patties served with spiced white peas curry.
ingredients: Sev and chopped coriander for garnish
procedure: 1. Mash boiled potatoes and mix with bread crumbs, salt, cumin powder, chaat masala, and black pepper.
2. Shape into patties and shallow-fry until golden brown.
3. In a pan, cook boiled white peas with turmeric powder and garam masala.
4. Serve the patties on a plate, topped with the white peas curry.
5. Drizzle tamarind and green chutney, then garnish with sev and coriander.

recipes.title: Bhel Puri
recipes.description: A light and crunchy chaat made with puffed rice, vegetables, and chutneys.
procedure: 1. In a large bowl, mix puffed rice, onions, tomatoes, and potatoes.
2. Add tamarind chutney and green chutney.
3. Sprinkle chaat masala, black salt, and red chili powder.
4. Mix well and top with sev and chopped coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Dabeli
recipes.description: A spicy and sweet Gujarati street food made with spiced potato filling in a bun.
ingredients: Chopped onions and coriander for garnish
procedure: 1. Mix mashed potatoes with dabeli masala, tamarind chutney, and green chutney.
2. Heat a pan and lightly toast the pav buns with butter.
3. Spread the spiced potato mixture inside the buns.
4. Add pomegranate seeds, roasted peanuts, and chopped onions.
5. Garnish with sev and coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Aloo Chaat
recipes.description: Crispy fried potatoes tossed with tangy spices and chutneys.
procedure: 1. Heat oil in a pan and fry the boiled potato cubes until golden brown.
2. Transfer the crispy potatoes to a bowl.
3. Add chaat masala, cumin powder, red chili powder, and black salt.
4. Drizzle tamarind and green chutney over the potatoes.
5. Garnish with chopped coriander and sev before serving.

recipes.title: Matar Chaat
recipes.description: A flavorful chaat made with spicy boiled white peas and topped with chutneys.
ingredients: 1 cup dried white peas (soaked and boiled)
Chopped coriander and sev for garnish
procedure: 1. Boil the soaked white peas until soft and mash slightly.
2. Mix in turmeric powder, garam masala, chaat masala, black salt, and red chili powder.
3. Transfer to a plate and top with onions and tomatoes.
4. Drizzle tamarind chutney and green chutney over the mixture.
5. Garnish with sev and chopped coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Corn Chaat
recipes.description: A healthy and tangy chaat made with sweet corn and flavorful spices.
procedure: 1. In a bowl, mix boiled sweet corn, onions, and tomatoes.
2. Add chaat masala, cumin powder, and black salt.
3. Squeeze lemon juice and mix well.
4. Drizzle tamarind chutney and green chutney over the mixture.
5. Garnish with chopped coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Moong Dal Chaat
recipes.description: A protein-rich chaat made with sprouted moong dal and fresh veggies.
procedure: 1. In a bowl, mix sprouted moong dal, onions, tomatoes, and boiled potatoes.
2. Add chaat masala, cumin powder, and black salt.
3. Squeeze lemon juice and mix well.
4. Drizzle green chutney over the mixture.
5. Garnish with chopped coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Raj Kachori
recipes.description: A royal chaat filled with a mix of potatoes, sprouts, chutneys, and yogurt.
procedure: 1. Make a hole in the center of each kachori.
2. Fill the kachoris with boiled potatoes and chickpeas.
3. Drizzle yogurt, tamarind chutney, and green chutney inside.
4. Sprinkle chaat masala, black salt, and cumin powder.
5. Top with sev and garnish with chopped coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Paneer Tikka Chaat
recipes.description: A fusion chaat made with spiced grilled paneer, chutneys, and veggies.
procedure: 1. Marinate paneer cubes with yogurt, turmeric, red chili powder, garam masala, cumin powder, and lemon juice for 15 minutes.
2. Grill or pan-fry the paneer until golden brown.
3. Arrange on a plate and top with chopped onions and tomatoes.
4. Drizzle tamarind and green chutney.
5. Sprinkle chaat masala and garnish with coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Dahi Bhalla Chaat
recipes.description: Soft lentil dumplings soaked in yogurt and topped with chutneys and spices.
procedure: 1. Make small balls from the ground urad dal and deep fry until golden brown.
2. Soak the fried bhallas in warm water for 10 minutes and squeeze out excess water.
3. Arrange on a plate and cover with whisked yogurt.
4. Drizzle tamarind and green chutney.
5. Sprinkle chaat masala, black salt, and cumin powder.
6. Garnish with sev and chopped coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Makhana Chaat
recipes.description: A crunchy and healthy chaat made with roasted makhana (fox nuts), veggies, and tangy spices.
procedure: 1. Dry roast makhana in a pan until crispy.
2. Mix roasted makhana with chopped cucumber, tomatoes, and onions.
3. Add chaat masala, cumin powder, and black salt.
4. Drizzle lemon juice and green chutney.
5. Garnish with chopped coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Pani Puri
recipes.description: A popular Indian street food consisting of crispy puris filled with spicy, tangy, and flavored water along with potato and chickpea stuffing.
procedure: 1. Mix mashed potatoes, chickpeas, onions, chaat masala, cumin powder, and black salt to prepare the stuffing.
2. Prepare the pani by blending mint, coriander, green chilies, cumin powder, black salt, and chilled water.
3. Poke a hole in each puri and stuff it with the potato-chickpea mixture.
4. Add a little tamarind chutney and green chutney.
5. Dip the filled puri into the chilled pani and serve immediately.

recipes.title: Dahi Puri
recipes.description: A delightful chaat dish made with crispy puris filled with spicy potato mixture and topped with yogurt, chutneys, and sev.
procedure: 1. Mix mashed potatoes, chickpeas, onions, chaat masala, cumin powder, and black salt to prepare the stuffing.
2. Poke a hole in each puri and fill it with the stuffing.
3. Add a spoonful of whisked yogurt over each puri.
4. Drizzle tamarind chutney and green chutney on top.
5. Sprinkle sev and chopped coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Classic Dark Chocolate
recipes.description: A simple and rich homemade dark chocolate made with cocoa butter, cocoa powder, and sweetener.
procedure: 1. Melt cocoa butter over a double boiler.
2. Stir in cocoa powder, honey, vanilla extract, and salt until smooth.
3. Pour into molds and refrigerate until set.
4. Remove from molds and store in a cool place.

recipes.title: Milk Chocolate Bars
recipes.description: Creamy homemade milk chocolate with a smooth texture and sweet taste.
procedure: 1. Melt cocoa butter over low heat.
2. Add milk powder, cocoa powder, and powdered sugar, stirring continuously.
3. Mix in vanilla extract and pour into molds.
4. Let it set in the refrigerator before serving.

recipes.title: White Chocolate Delight
recipes.description: Smooth and creamy homemade white chocolate made with cocoa butter and milk powder.
procedure: 1. Melt cocoa butter over a double boiler.
2. Stir in powdered sugar, milk powder, vanilla extract, and salt.
3. Pour into molds and refrigerate until set.
4. Remove from molds and store in a cool place.

recipes.title: Hazelnut Chocolate Truffles
recipes.description: Rich chocolate truffles with a crunchy hazelnut center.
procedure: 1. Heat cream and mix it into melted chocolate.
2. Stir in vanilla extract and let the mixture cool until thick.
3. Roll into small balls and coat with crushed hazelnuts or cocoa powder.
4. Refrigerate until firm and serve.

recipes.title: Coconut Chocolate Bars
recipes.description: Homemade chocolate bars filled with coconut and coated with dark chocolate.
procedure: 1. Mix shredded coconut, condensed milk, and vanilla extract.
2. Shape into small bars and freeze until firm.
3. Dip each bar into melted chocolate and place on parchment paper.
4. Refrigerate until chocolate hardens and serve.

recipes.title: Kunafa Chocolate
recipes.description: A fusion of Middle Eastern kunafa and rich chocolate, offering a crunchy and creamy texture.
procedure: 1. Toast the shredded kunafa dough with melted butter until golden brown.
2. Mix condensed milk with melted chocolate and stir until smooth.
3. Layer the toasted kunafa at the bottom of a mold.
4. Pour the chocolate mixture over the kunafa layer.
5. Sprinkle chopped pistachios on top and refrigerate until set.

recipes.title: Fruit and Nut Chocolate
recipes.description: A delightful mix of dried fruits and crunchy nuts covered in smooth dark chocolate.
procedure: 1. Melt the dark chocolate over a double boiler.
2. Stir in chopped nuts, dried cranberries, and raisins.
3. Pour into molds and refrigerate until firm.
4. Remove from molds and enjoy.

recipes.title: Roasted Almond Chocolate
recipes.description: Homemade chocolate infused with the rich flavor of roasted almonds.
procedure: 1. Melt the dark chocolate over a double boiler.
2. Stir in roasted almonds, sea salt, and vanilla extract.
3. Pour into molds and refrigerate until set.
4. Remove from molds and store in a cool place.

recipes.title: Peanut Butter Chocolate Cups
recipes.description: Creamy peanut butter encased in rich dark chocolate, a perfect homemade treat.
procedure: 1. Melt half of the dark chocolate and pour into cupcake liners.
2. Freeze for 10 minutes until firm.
3. Mix peanut butter, honey, vanilla extract, and salt.
4. Add a spoonful of the peanut butter mixture on top of the chocolate layer.
5. Cover with remaining melted chocolate and refrigerate until set.

recipes.title: Chocolate Truffle Balls
recipes.description: Rich, smooth, and decadent chocolate truffle balls with a soft ganache center.
procedure: 1. Heat the heavy cream until warm and pour over chopped chocolate.
2. Stir until smooth and mix in vanilla extract.
3. Let the ganache cool until firm, then roll into small balls.
4. Coat with cocoa powder and refrigerate until set.

recipes.title: Dark Chocolate Bark
recipes.description: A simple and delicious chocolate bark loaded with nuts and dried fruits.
procedure: 1. Melt the dark chocolate over a double boiler.
2. Spread the melted chocolate on a parchment-lined tray.
3. Sprinkle almonds, dried cranberries, and pumpkin seeds on top.
4. Sprinkle sea salt and let it set in the fridge.
5. Once hardened, break into pieces and serve.

recipes.title: Coconut Chocolate Truffles
recipes.description: A rich and creamy chocolate truffle coated with coconut flakes.
procedure: 1. Heat the heavy cream and pour over chopped chocolate.
2. Stir until smooth and mix in vanilla extract.
3. Let the mixture cool and roll into small balls.
4. Roll the truffles in shredded coconut and refrigerate until set.

recipes.title: Caramel Filled Chocolates
recipes.description: Soft caramel filling encased in rich chocolate, a perfect homemade treat.
procedure: 1. Melt half of the dark chocolate and pour into chocolate molds.
2. Let it set in the fridge for 10 minutes.
3. Add a spoonful of caramel sauce to each mold.
4. Cover with the remaining melted chocolate and refrigerate until firm.

recipes.title: Mint Chocolate Bars
recipes.description: A refreshing minty chocolate bar with a smooth and creamy texture.
procedure: 1. Melt the white chocolate and mix in peppermint extract and green food coloring.
2. Pour a layer of dark chocolate into a mold and let it set.
3. Add a layer of mint-flavored white chocolate.
4. Cover with another layer of dark chocolate and refrigerate until set.

recipes.title: Hazelnut Praline Chocolate
recipes.description: A crunchy hazelnut praline wrapped in smooth milk chocolate.
procedure: 1. Caramelize sugar in a pan, add hazelnuts and butter, and mix well.
2. Let the mixture cool and then crush it into small pieces.
3. Mix the hazelnut praline with melted milk chocolate.
4. Pour into molds and refrigerate until firm.
